title.rendered: Intruder alarm package for doors upto 280kg

content.rendered:
Intruder alarm package for doors upto 280kg

  1.  Magnetic Contact for Doors – magnetic door contact is an automatic alarm for monitoring doors, windows or other movable parts.
  2. 8 core alarm cable 100m White –  The intruder alarm signal cable is made of the highest quality raw materials.
  3. Risco LightSYS 8 Zone Alarm System – LightSYS™2 is a professional hybrid security system for the residential and commercial sectors that is flexible, reliable, and easy to install.
  4. Lightsys GSM/GPRS Module – The GSM/GPRS module is an easy to add plug-in module that enables the system to communicate over the GPRS/GSM networks for reporting, control and programming.
  5. Intruder Alarm vibration sensor – The Alarm protects your property with Vibration Sensor by giving out an alarm sound when it senses vibration, shaking, striking, and moving.
  6. PIR Motion Sensor – This product is a wired dual passive infrared detector, exquisite design, easy installation.

excerpt.rendered:
Intruder alarm package for doors up to 280kg

  • Magnetic contact
  • 8 core cable
  • Siren kit
  • Lightsys panel
  • Lightsys GSM module
  • Intruder alarm vibration sensor
  • PIR motion sensor
